game_description: The VR-PhotoStudio is a Virtual Reality teaching-learning application for photography education. Educational content is conveyed playfully through exploratory learning and made tangible through a combination of knowledge building and deepening. In particular, the medium is used to experience perspective, space, and the design elements of photography. Awarded with the AVRiL 2022 –Silver– at the competition "AVRiL 2022 - Successful VR/AR Learning Scenarios" of the working group "VR/AR-Learning" of the GI specialist groups “Educational Technologies” and "VR/AR". Awarded with the 1st place at the XR SCIENCE AWARD 2022 in the category IMMERSION & INTERFACE by the "German Institute for Virtual Realities" (DIVR).
